thread.title: Zuckerberg Must Face Fraud Claims in Property Dispute Trial
thread.title_full: Zuckerberg Must Face Fraud Claims in Property Dispute Trial - Bloomberg Business

author: Bloomberg.com
title: Zuckerberg Must Face Fraud Claims in Property Dispute Trial
text:
Mark Zuckerberg lost a bid to dismiss fraud claims in a developer’s lawsuit alleging that the billionaire reneged on a promise to introduce him to Silicon Valley’s elite as part of a land deal.
The case against the founder of Facebook Inc. moved closer to a trial Thursday after a state judge in San Jose, California, denied Zuckerberg’s request to throw out claims that he didn’t keep his word in a $1.7 million deal that ended plans for a mansion with a view into the 31-year-old billionaire’s bedroom. Superior Court Judge Patricia Lucas said at a hearing Thursday she’ll consider Zuckerberg’s arguments before making a final decision on a breach of contract claim.
